name: Laboratory Corporation of America Holdings
goal: LabCorpÂ® is a leading global life sciences company that is deeply integrated in guiding patient care. Through its two business segments, LabCorp Diagnostics and Covance Drug Development, the company provides comprehensive clinical laboratory and end-to-end drug development services. By bringing together world-class diagnostics and drug development capabilities, LabCorp is positioned at the convergence of research and care delivery to enable more precise and individualized healthcare
